>
[Reach Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=4577) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=817" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=735" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 101 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 138 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You can extend your spells’ range. If the next action you use is to [Cast a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=72) that has a range, increase that spell’s range by 30 feet. As is standard for increasing spell ranges, if the spell normally has a range of touch, you extend its range to 30 feet.

<title level="2">Reach Spell leads to...</title>
[Knowledge of Shapes](/Feats.aspx?ID=6061)
